reviewText: ...My kids cannot get enough of this adorable video! My daughter got it for her birthday, and she's a Wubbzy fanatic. She has all the DVDs and this one is officially her favorite (at least until Wubb Idol comes out). This is a really cute compilation of seasonal Wubbzy episodes, many of which are not on TV until late October and then at no other time. So you probably won't get too tired of seeing it. Unless your kids want to watch it every day like mine do... but I can think of many much worse things!
He is just twenty months, and he loves Wubbzy, he even cries if something happen to him. I love it too. And buying from Amazon is always the best, price service everything.
My kids watch this Wubbzy DVD over and over again, they love it. Wonderful DVD!
My daughter loves wubbzy this is the 2nd dvd of the wubbzy goes boo. I like wubbzy for my child because it teaches to share and about caring and has no bad content in it. Great cartoon for kids.
My 4 1/2-year-old loves this DVD.  She doesn't usually like the Halloween DVDs because they give her bad dreams, but this one is so mild...and it teaches lessons as well!
My 3 year old watches it all the time, I am tired of it but he truely enjoys it;)
My two year old loves this DVD and I feel that it at least provides some educational material in it!
Gave this to my son for Halloween, it was a great way to start his day and he was so excited to watch it.

Wubbzy really can't ever disappoint my child.  And it is one of very few kid shows that I find cute to watch.  The fall season episodes are especially cute and funny.  There are a few episodes that aren't on tv (at least I have never seen them), so that in and of itself made the purchase worthwhile.

As an adult, I was a little disappointed that there weren't any new episodes on this particular DVD, but it's not for me so I guess that is a moot point. My 2-year-old is obsessed with Wubbzy and absolutely adores this collection. It's bright, fun and just all-around cute. It's one of the few shows that doesn't absolutely irk me to have on in the background (Honestly, I can't handle Backyardigans or Dora; the music and voices drive me nuts!), and I approve of her watching it. Wow, wow, everyone! :)
Like new thank you so much!!
Grandkids love it

Wow wow everyone, this DVD features a number of monsters gruesome for a 3 year old and also features a character inventing a device that knocks the head off of another character!  My kid was scared and now I am paying for therapy.  Would not recommend.
Child loves Wubbzy!
My daughter loves this show. If she's happy, I'm happy.
nice, fun episodes - great for Halloween/fall time
The DVD, "Wow! Wow! Wubbzy!: Wubbzy Goes Boo! came really quickly, and was in great shape. My son loves it, so I am happy.
we lose one from library so had to purchase exactly same one to compensate for it. It is a fun show.
my daughter just adores wubbzy. and i love that it is a holloween themed dvd. will order more very soon.

Disclaimer: I find Wubbzy to be terribly annoying. But, I'm an adult. My kids love this DVD and watch it over and over again each Halloween.

It consists of 6 episodes of "Wow Wow Wobbzy." Three are Halloween themed, one is fall themed, and two are kind of a stretch to connect to the season. My kids don't care, though. The content is certainly appropriate for preschoolers, the parents just might not find it as entertaining as some other videos.
